column2: Basic survival skill.Including fishing, planting, gathering materials.

Skills of creating. Crafting tools, weapons, protection.
Skills of sailing, navigation and mapping.
Skills of fighting. Increase strength, speed, use of weapons and battle technic.

found a baby in the shark body.
I feel nothing about it now.
How did I think before for that thing.
I like it for a long time, long for it.
It's worth changing my mind for it.
Something happens in my mind, I want it much.
I have it, but I don't care.
Finally, I have something which I like.
I have but I don't like it.
Finally, I have what I dream of.
I used to have it, but I didn't cherish.
